name: Rowntrees Fruit Pastilles Sharing Bag 170g (Pack of 12)
description: Good to remember 25% fruit juice is squeezed into these Rowntree's Fruit Pastilles. Enjoy as part of a varied, balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Each 1/4 bag serving contains Calories 122 = 7%, Sugars 19.8g = 23%. Fat Nil = 0%, Saturates Nil = 0%, Salt 0.1g = 2% of a child's guideline daily amount.
